name: Wee Tanks! Campaign
summary: Learn about .CAMPAIGN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Studio Kit Wee Tanks! is a 3D shooter in which players pilot a toy tank around battlegrounds that look as though they were built using children's toys. It is available for Windows and macOS.

Players can create custom Wee Tanks! maps and campaigns (which consist of multiple maps and levels) using the game's map editor. To do so, they select Map Editor → New campaign. After players finish creating their campaign, they can save it by pressing the Esc key and selecting Save Campaign. This saves the campaign as a CAMPAIGN file, in the player's Documents/​My Games/​Wee Tanks directory.
NOTE: CAMPAIGN files have been replaced by .WTCAMP files.

description: A CAMPAIGN file contains a custom Wee Tanks! campaign. Each CAMPAIGN file includes a record of the custom maps that the campaign contains. Players create and load CAMPAIGN files using the Wee Tanks! map editor.

instructions: You can open a CAMPAIGN file in Wee Tanks! (Windows, Mac). To do so, first place the file in your Documents/​My Games/​Wee Tanks directory. Then, open Wee Tanks! and select Map Editor → Play Campaign. The campaign your CAMPAIGN file contains will appear in the list of custom campaigns.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .campaign file in Studio Kit Wee Tanks!
images.caption: CAMPAIGN file open in Studio Kit Wee Tanks!
